turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to order a coffee drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, I can help you with that. Which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there one in Woodbury?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, there's a Starbucks at 7230 Valley Creek Road in Woodbury.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good, that's close by.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will this be for pick up or in-store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A grande latte. With what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Gee, I don't know. What are my choices?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, coconut, nonfat, whole, two percent, and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like a flavor shot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just a plain latte, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any sugar or sweetener?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the plain latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, I have placed an order for a grande latte with whole milk. It will be ready shortly at the drive-thru at Starbucks at 7230 Valley Creek Road in Woodbury. It will be billed to your account with Starbucks and a receipt will be sent to your mobile phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome! Enjoy your coffee!
